title: Dr. Elizabeth Scala Talks About Her Course at UT, “The Taylor Swift Songbook"
description:
This professor is making the media rounds for coming up with this genius course in college, “The Taylor Swift Songbook".. Dr. Elizabeth Scala joins the podcast to talk about her inspiration in teaching a course on Taylor Swift's songwriting! And we even invited ourselves to the class!
What did we miss? What would you like to hear from us? There's lots of ways to reach us!
CONTACT THE PODCAST!
Email – the13podcast@gmail.com
IG: https://www.instagram.com/the13podcast

This podcast is in no way related to or endorsed by Taylor Swift, her companies, or record labels. All opinions are our own.
